Returns: supported event code. Can be null if device does not provide the property.
getEventsSupported().Description: Returns event code supported by the device.

Returns: the device version This value will never be null.
getVersion().Description: Returns the version string the MTP device

Returns: If the given operation is supported by the device or not.
isOperationSupported(int).Description: Returns if the given operation is supported by the device or not.

Returns: the model name This value will never be null.
getModel().Description: Returns the model name for the MTP device

Returns: the serial number This value will never be null.
getSerialNumber().Description: Returns the unique serial number for the MTP device

Returns: supported operation code. Can be null if device does not provide the property.
getOperationsSupported().Description: Returns operation code supported by the device.

Returns: the manufacturer name This value will never be null.
getManufacturer().Description: Returns the manufacturer's name for the MTP device

Returns: If the given event is supported by the device or not.
isEventSupported(int).Description: Returns if the given event is supported by the device or not.

ClassDesc: This class encapsulates information about an MTP device. This corresponds to the DeviceInfo Dataset described in section 5.1.1 of the MTP specification.
